name: FuteBLO
description:
Abducted FutePen.
　A new enemy, the name is the BlockBreaker Nation.
　To rescue his fellow soldier FutePen, Kumakku sleeps, or rather rises!!!
　Can Kumakku beat the BlockBreaker six knights???

　Whoever called it Fute&Kuma's BlockBreaker game.

　Controlling is just moving the paddle to right or left.
　But taking advantage of the undestructible walls, gravity, anti-gravity, warp system and so on, devising the structure of stages, the game experience is enriched with refreshment of continuous block breaking and strategy of how to move to continuous block breaking.
